item.title: 电子商务公司 Pattern 在纳斯达克上市后股价下跌，估值达 23.8 亿美元
item.description: Pattern Group 的股价周五在纳斯达克首次亮相时下跌了近 3.6%，这家电子商务公司的估值为 23.8 亿美元。【原文：Pattern Group's shares fell nearly 3.6% in their Nasdaq debut on Friday, valuing the e-commerce firm at $2.38 billion.】

item.title: 波音防务公司的罢工机工批准了工会提议的合同，但遭到公司拒绝
item.description: 国际机械师和航空航天工人协会（IAM）周五宣布，波音防务公司的罢工工人以 90% 的投票率批准了工会领导层提出的为期四年的合同提案，而管理层已经拒绝考虑该提案。【原文：Striking workers at Boeing Defense voted 90% to approve a four-year contract proposal from union leadership that management has already refused to consider, the International Association of Machinists and Aerospace Workers (IAM) announced Friday.】

item.title: 纽蒙特以约 4.39 亿美元的价格出售全部奥拉股份，推动资产剥离
item.description: 黄金矿商纽蒙特公司周五表示，作为其资产剥离计划的一部分，该公司通过多伦多证券交易所以 4.39 亿美元的价格出售了其在奥拉矿业公司（Orla Mining）的股份。【原文：Gold miner Newmont said on Friday it sold its stake in Orla Mining for $439 million through the Toronto Stock Exchange as part of its divestiture program.】

item.title: 大众汽车因保时捷重组损失 60 亿美元
item.description: 欧洲最大的汽车制造商大众汽车公司（Volkswagen）周五表示，该公司将因跑车部门保时捷公司（Porsche AG）影响深远的产品改革而蒙受 51 亿欧元（60 亿美元）的损失，同时电动车型的推出也将放缓。【原文：Volkswagen , Europe's largest carmaker, said on Friday it will take a 5.1 billion euro ($6 billion) hit from a far-reaching product overhaul at sportscar division Porsche AG , with slower roll-outs of electric models.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行将于 9 月 25 日将基准利率下调 25 个基点至 7.50
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，墨西哥央行将于 9 月 25 日再次将基准利率下调四分之一个百分点，使其达到 7.50%。【原文：Mexico's central bank is set to again lower its benchmark interest rate by a quarter of a percentage point on September 25, taking it to 7.50%, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 将在五年内斥资 1000 亿美元购买备份服务器
item.description: 据《信息报》周五援引公司高管与股东的讨论报道，OpenAI 计划在未来五年内斥资约 1,000 亿美元从云供应商处租用备份服务器。【原文：OpenAI plans to spend about $100 billion renting backup servers from cloud providers over the next five years, the Information reported on Friday, citing company executives' discussions with shareholders.】

item.title: Monte dei Paschi 在要约收购倒数第二天获得 Mediobanca 70.5% 的股份
item.description: 周五的交易所数据显示，Monte dei Paschi di Siena 已获得 Mediobanca 超过三分之二的资本，超过了推动任何特殊股东决策所需的所有权门槛。【原文：Monte dei Paschi di Siena has secured more than two thirds of Mediobanca's capital, bourse data showed on Friday, crossing the ownership threshold needed to push through any extraordinary shareholder decisions.】

item.title: 菲拉格慕家族重申对任何 "非同寻常 "的交易不感兴趣
item.description: 菲拉格慕家族周五表示，他们对任何涉及同名奢侈品公司的 "特殊交易 "都不感兴趣。【原文：The Ferragamo family said on Friday it was not interested in any kind of "extraordinary transactions" involving the eponymous luxury company.】

item.title: 应业界要求，NHTSA 将新车评级更新推迟一年
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周五表示，在汽车制造商的要求下，该局将推迟实施美国政府于 12 月最终确定的新车评估计划的更新内容。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said Friday that it will delay implementation of updates to the U.S. government's New Car Assessment Program finalized in December after a request by automakers.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会主席称市场可决定公司报告的 "节奏
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）周五对CNBC表示，随着监管机构推进唐纳德-特朗普总统关于终止季度报告的要求，投资者和银行可能会帮助制定上市公司报告的新时间表。【原文：Investors and banks are likely to help set any new timeline for public company reporting as regulators press ahead on President Donald Trump's bid to end quarterly reports, U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission Chairman Paul Atkins told CNBC on Friday.】

item.title: 美国股票基金因投资者获利而大量流出
item.description: 在截至9月17日的一周内，投资者从美国股票基金中撤出了大量资金，因为他们对近期美联储下调政策利率后市场的高估值持谨慎态度，并急于锁定利润。【原文：Investors withdrew massive capital out of U.S. equity funds in the week to Sept. 17 as they turned cautious about the market's lofty valuations following the recent rally through a policy rate cut by the Federal Reserve and rushed to lock in profits.】

item.title: 据《信息报》报道，OpenAI 与苹果供应商合作制造人工智能设备
item.description: The Information 周五援引知情人士的话报道称，OpenAI 已与苹果设备组装商 Luxshare 签订协议，将生产一款消费类设备。【原文：OpenAI has signed a deal with Apple device assembler, Luxshare , to make a consumer device, the Information reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 全球股票基金每周流出量激增
item.description: 截至 9 月 17 日的一周内，投资者大规模撤资股票基金以锁定利润，原因是全球股市在美联储降息的影响下延续了创纪录的涨势，引发了投资者对股市高估值的谨慎情绪。【原文：Investors divested equity funds on a large scale in the week to September 17 to lock in profits as an extended record-setting rally in global stocks amid an interest rate cut by the Federal Reserve raised investor caution around the stock market's lofty valuations.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局称已实现今年招聘 2,000 名管制员的目标
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）的一位高级官员周五表示，该机构在截至9月30日的12个月内实现了招聘2000名空中交通管制员的目标，明年的目标是招聘2200名。【原文：A senior official at the Federal Aviation Administration said Friday the agency met its goal of hiring 2,000 air traffic controllers in the 12 months ending Sept. 30 and aims to hire 2,200 next year.】

item.title: Blackstone 任命 Katie Keenan 为房地产收益信托基金首席执行官
item.description: Blackstone 周五表示，已任命 Katie Keenan 为其房地产收益信托基金首席执行官兼 Core+ 业务全球主管。【原文：Blackstone said on Friday it has appointed Katie Keenan as the CEO of its real estate income trust and global head of the Core+ business.】

item.title: 英国评估捷豹路虎网络攻击对供应链造成的影响
item.description: 英国政府周五表示，正在与捷豹路虎（JLR）密切合作，以了解该国最大的汽车制造商三周多前因网络事件停产后对供应链造成的影响。【原文：Britain's government said on Friday it was working closely with Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) to understand the impacts on the supply chain after a cyber incident at the country's biggest carmaker stopped production more than three weeks ago.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，必和必拓可能任命杰拉尔丁-斯莱特里（Geraldine Slattery）为首位女性首席执行官
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周五报道，必和必拓集团很可能任命该公司现任澳大利亚负责人杰拉尔丁-斯莱特里（Geraldine Slattery）为首位女性首席执行官，接替现任首席执行官迈克-亨利（Mike Henry）。【原文：BHP Group is likely to appoint Geraldine Slattery, the miner's current head of Australia, as its first female chief executive to replace current CEO Mike Henry, the Financial Times reported on Friday.】

item.title: 南加州爱迪生公司与其他公司达成和解，将收回与野火相关的 20 亿美元
item.description: 南加州爱迪生公司（Southern California Edison）已与几位干预者达成和解协议，允许该公司从 2017-2018 年野火和泥石流事件造成的 56 亿美元损失中追回约 20 亿美元。【原文：Southern California Edison has reached a settlement agreement with several intervenors to allow the utility to recover about $2 billion of $5.6 billion in losses tied to the 2017–2018 wildfire and mudslide events.】

item.title: 安哥拉财政官员称，安哥拉将于11月就摩根大通10亿美元交易作出决定
item.description: 安哥拉一位高级债务官员告诉路透社，安哥拉将在11月前决定是否从摩根大通展期10亿美元的总回报掉期，或可能在国际资本市场上筹集资金。【原文：Angola will decide by November whether to roll over its $1 billion total return swap from JPMorgan, or potentially raise the money on international capital markets, a senior debt official told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国华为联合开发 DeepSeek 模型，改进审查功能
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为联合开发了一款以安全为重点的人工智能模型 DeepSeek，并称该模型在防止讨论政治敏感话题方面 "几乎 100% 成功"。【原文：Chinese tech giant Huawei has co-developed a safety-focused version of artificial intelligence model DeepSeek that it said is "nearly 100% successful" in preventing discussion of politically sensitive topics.】

item.title: 贸易部长称肯尼亚力争年底前与美国达成贸易协议
item.description: 肯尼亚贸易部长告诉路透社记者，肯尼亚预计将在年底前与美国达成一项贸易协议，如果本月到期的现有地区贸易安排不再续约，此举将缓解肯尼亚对这一关键市场的出口。【原文：Kenya expects to conclude a trade deal with the United States by year-end, its trade minister told Reuters, a move that could cushion its exports to a key market if an existing regional trade arrangement that expires this month is not renewed.】

item.title: 苹果利用人工智能开发出手表中的新血压通知功能
item.description: 周五上市的 Apple Watch Series 11 型号可以通知用户他们可能有高血压，这是公司利用人工智能而不是血压计提供的一项功能。【原文：Apple Watch Series 11 models that go on sale on Friday can notify users that they may have high blood pressure, in a feature the company has powered using artificial intelligence rather than a blood pressure monitor.】

item.title: 贝莱德与 Vanguard 因新指导意见而缩减公司会谈规模
item.description: 披露的信息显示，全球最大的两家资产管理公司今年大幅缩减了与公司老板举行会议的次数，因为新的指导意见增加了讨论气候变化和多元化等话题的难度。【原文：The world's two biggest asset managers sharply scaled back the number of meetings held with company bosses this year, disclosures show, as new guidance made it harder to discuss topics like climate change and diversity.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利认为，考虑到劳动力市场风险，今年再降息两次可能是合适的
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周五表示，他支持本周将美国基准短期利率下调四分之一个百分点的决定，并认为在美联储今年的最后两次会议上，每次下调相同幅度的利率都是合适的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Minneapolis President Neel Kashkari on Friday said he supported this week's decision to cut the U.S. benchmark short-term interest rate by a quarter of a percentage point, and feels that same-sized rate cuts at each of the Fed's final two meetings of the year will be appropriate.】

item.title: 早间竞标央行红利
item.description: 看看《投资回报率》责任编辑安娜-西曼斯基（Anna Szymanski）和《投资回报率》团队的其他成员周末要阅读、观看和聆听的内容。【原文：Check out what ROI Editor-in-Charge Anna Szymanski and the rest of the ROI team are excited to read, watch and listen to over the weekend.】

item.title: 欧盟部长寻求就独立于维萨卡和万事达卡的数字欧元达成协议
item.description: 欧盟各国财长将于周五就如何建立一种数字欧元货币达成共同立场，这种数字欧元货币可以替代目前占主导地位的美国维萨卡和万事达卡系统。【原文：European Union finance ministers will seek to reach a common position on Friday on how to set up a digital euro currency that could become an alternative to the now dominant U.S.-based Visa and Mastercard systems.】

item.title: 特朗普的联邦通信委员会主席卡尔用新方法利用旧权力约束媒体公司
item.description: 美国最高媒体监管机构布兰登-卡尔（Brendan Carr）向华特-迪士尼（Walt Disney）施压，要求其停止播出一档深夜脱口秀节目，这引发了民主党议员和其他批评人士的愤怒，并要求他辞职。【原文：Top U.S. media regulator Brendan Carr has sparked outrage and calls for his resignation from Democratic lawmakers and other critics after he pressured Walt Disney to stop running a late-night talk show.】

item.title: 美股期货持稳，股指将实现周线上涨；联邦快递上涨
item.description: 周五，美国股指期货趋于稳定，在上一交易日主要股指升至纪录高位后有所停顿，而包裹递送公司联邦快递（FedEx）在超出季度盈利预期后上涨。【原文：U.S. stock index futures stabilized on Friday, pausing after the main indexes rallied to record highs in the previous session, while parcel delivery company FedEx rose after beating quarterly earnings expectations.】

item.title: 聚焦：奢侈品牌的巨大挑战：了解 Z 世代
item.description: 来自法国的 Fleur Arbel 和 Christophe Kairouz 最近被路易威登纽约旗舰店入口处的彩色长颈鹿和鸵鸟雕塑所吸引。【原文：Fleur Arbel and Christophe Kairouz, both from France, were lured into Louis Vuitton's New York flagship recently by a colorful sculpture of a monogrammed giraffe and ostrich above the store's entrance.】

item.title: 加拿大海斯拉人如何成为世界上第一个土著液化天然气业主
item.description: 海斯拉原住民的新首领莫琳-奈斯（Maureen Nyce）戴上了硬礼帽，穿上了安全背心，于八月前往锡达液化天然气管道现场视察，她这样做并不是以来访政要或文化使者的身份，而是以业主的身份。【原文：When Maureen Nyce, the new chief of the Haisla First Nation, donned a hard hat and safety vest for an August visit to the site of the Cedar LNG pipeline, she did so not as a visiting dignitary or cultural emissary - but as an owner.】
